definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Well, my surface sits exactly above this region U in the xy plane.
sentences.chinese: 這個曲面正好在xy平面上，區域U的上方。

sentences.english: The support tube profile will be extruded to this surface.
sentences.chinese: 支撐細管輪廓將被擠出至此曲面。

sentences.english: Under error control the electrode non-uniform compensated surface was approximated.
sentences.chinese: 在控制誤差下，逼近補償後的非均勻電板曲面。

sentences.english: One such surface is known as the pseudosphere.
sentences.chinese: 一個這樣的曲面名爲僞球面。

sentences.english: Surface editing is indispensable in point-based data treatment.
sentences.chinese: 曲面編輯是點雲處理不可缺少的研究內容。

sentences.english: We present a new high quality tessellation method for implicit surfaces in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種新的隱式曲面高質量三角化方法。

sentences.english: And surface reconstruction is the most important technology in RE.
sentences.chinese: 逆向工程中最爲關鍵的技術就是曲面重構技術。

sentences.english: Then the theory of TBSC and TBBC curves and surfaces are discussed in details.
sentences.chinese: BSC曲線曲面論，這是本文的重點內容之一。

sentences.english: I am taking this grid on my surface given by the u and v directions.
sentences.chinese: 在曲面上取這個格子由u，v方向給出的。

sentences.english: The complex surface matching and machining allowance solving have been done.
sentences.chinese: 葉片曲面的匹配及加工餘量的計算。

sentences.english: Let's say that I gave you this curve bounding this surface.
sentences.chinese: 給你這個曲面和這個曲線作爲它的邊。

sentences.english: This method can also be used for paraboloid and hyperboloid.
sentences.chinese: 這種方法也適用於拋物面和雙曲面。

sentences.english: Use geometry or you need to set up for double integral of a surface.
sentences.chinese: 總之，就是用幾何方法或是在曲面上建立二重積分。

sentences.english: The curved glass lenses at each end of the telescope acted like prisms.
sentences.chinese: 望遠鏡兩端的曲面玻璃鏡頭起到了三棱鏡的作用。

sentences.english: This article focuses on three plane B-spline surfaces of the fairing.
sentences.chinese: 本文着重討論了三次平面B樣條曲線曲面的光順。

sentences.english: The horizontal spread of the rectangular V-type curved otter board increased by 43.
sentences.chinese: 矩形V型曲面網板的水平擴張力可增大43。

definition: body of a vehicle or machine/fuselage of a plane
